name: AstronautShowdown
description:
2PLAYERS ARE NEEDED FOR THE GAME

Controls: 

Player 1 Movement: W,A,D

Player 1 Shoot: S

Player 2 Movement: I,J,L

Player 2 Shoot: K

Astronaut Showdown Is a game where you are a astronaut in Space Fighting to the death. Currently this game is underdevelopment and is in Beta so there is only 1 map and bugs.
